faq.question: Does it work with international annual reports?
faq.answer: Yes! We support annual reports from companies worldwide, including different accounting standards (GAAP, IFRS).

faq.question: Can it extract segment-level financials?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI identifies business unit performance, geographic segments, and product line breakdown.

faq.question: Does it identify risks and challenges?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI extracts risk factors, competitive threats, and challenges mentioned throughout the report.

faq.question: Can I compare multiple years or companies?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support comparative analysis across years and competitive benchmarking.

faq.question: What about quarterly reports?
faq.answer: Yes! We support all formats: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, annual reports, and quarterly earnings releases.
